attributes.action: MAKE PERJURY CARRY AN EQUAL SENTENCE TO THE CRIME BEING TRIED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An Accused person should be given three options, Not Guilty, Guilty or Guilty with a mitigating circumstance then someone pleading 'Guilty' would get the appropriate sentence whilst someone pleading 'Not Guilty'who is subsequently found to be Guilty would receive,automatically, a penalty for that perjury equal to the appropriate sentence for the crime committed. This would deal with the defective ruling which now rewards someone for a guilty plea even when they are caught 'redhanded'
